verses.name: Judges 9:33
verses.text: And it shall be, that in the morning, as soon as the sun is up, thou shalt rise early, and set upon the city: and, behold, when he and the people that is with him come out against thee, then mayest thou do to them as thou shalt find occasion.

verses.name: Judges 9:34
verses.text: And Abimelech rose up, and all the people that were with him, by night, and they laid wait against Shechem in four companies.
